F5 Distributed Cloud Workshop¶

Welcome¶

Warning

Workshop under construction

Welcome to the Workshop Volterra 10x - 2022

The content contained here leverages a full DevOps CI/CD pipeline and is sourced from the GitHub repository at https://github.com/f5devcentral/volterra-workshop-10x. Bugs and Requests for enhancements can be made by opening an Issue within the repository.

This workshop is focused on F5 Distributed Cloud so F5ers, Partners and customers can understand and learn the basics of F5XC. It covers:

  • The 3 main WAAP use cases (Class 1)
    • Application exposed on internet and protected by F5XC Global Network (RE only)
    • Application not exposed on internet and only available in a private zone (VPC, VNET, internal VLAN …) and protected by F5XC Global Network (RE + CE)
    • Application not exposed on internet and protected by F5XS instance in a private zone (CE only)
  • How to apply and create a Positive Security policy with F5XC WAAP (Class 2)
  • F5XC Shape Bot Protection (Class 2)
  • A dedidacted workshop for Modern App Specialists (Class 3)

Contents:

  • Class1 - F5XC WAAP Use Cases
    • Module 1 - Use Case 1 - Expose public application and protect it with F5XC WAAP
      • Lab 1 - Architecture of the lab
      • Lab 2 - Expose the public application
      • Lab 3 - Create and Apply a WAAP Policy
      • Lab 4 - Manage False Positive
    • Module 2 - Use Case 2 - Expose a private application and protect it with F5XC WAAP
      • Lab 1 - Expose the private Arcadia application
    • Module 3 - Use Case 3 - Protect an app running in Public Cloud only
      • Lab 1 - Expose the private Arcadia application through the Mesh Node only (CE-Only)
  • Class2 - F5XC WAAP Advanced Features
    • Module 1 - Deployed a Positive Security Policy
      • Lab 1 - Enable IP Reputation
      • Lab 2 - Allow HTTP Methods, File Types and Geolocalisation
    • Module 2 - F5XC Shape Bot Defense
      • Lab 1 - Apply Shape Bot Defense protection
  • Class3 - Volterra Workshop for Modern App Specialists
    • Module 1
      • Lab 1 - The Sentence Application
      • Lab 2 - Deploy the app in Azure AKS and expose it on Volterra Global Network
      • Lab 3 - Deploy Colors microservice on premises and expose it
      • Lab 4 - Add WAAP protection
      • Lab 5 - Add GSLB for Front End Service
